articles.title: Veteran actor Seema Deo dies at 81 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Veteran Marathi actor Seema Deo has died at 81. She was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease. | Bollywood
articles.content:
Veteran actor Seema Deo, remembered for her roles in Anand and Kora Kagaz, died here on Thursday morning due to age-related ailments, her filmmaker son Abhinay Deo said. She was 81.
